name: Blue Exorcist: The Phantom Labyrinth of Time
summary: Blue Exorcist: The Phantom Labyrinth of Time is a PSP game produced by Namco Bandai, based on the game and manga Blue Exorcist. It's a visual novel mixed with RPG style combat.
